MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 一个对象，用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: An object used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是线程安全的。 is not thread safe. 派生类可以使用此属性提供自己的同步版本 。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using this property. 同步代码必须对类的属性执行操作 ，而不是直接在类本身上执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the class, not directly on the class itself. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改对象的其他线程保持正确的同步 。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/CPP/asnencodeddata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/CS/asnencodeddata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/VB/asnencodeddata.vb#1)]
